data.title: Creative Portfolio Website
data.meta_description: A modern portfolio website with 3D animations
data.content:
This portfolio website showcases modern web development techniques including 3D animations with Three.js, smooth animations with GSAP, and server-side rendering with Next.js.

The site features an interactive 3D hero section, smooth scrolling animations, and a fully responsive design that works beautifully on all devices.

data.title: E-Commerce Platform
data.content:
Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform with shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard.

The platform includes features like product management, order tracking, user authentication, and a comprehensive admin panel for managing the entire store.

data.title: Task Management Application
data.content:
A collaborative task management application built with React and Firebase. Features real-time updates, team collaboration, and project tracking.

Users can create projects, assign tasks, set deadlines, and track progress in real-time with a beautiful, intuitive interface.
